sourcesContent: import o,{useContext as t,useMemo as a}from"react";import r from"../utils/with-defaults";import{ModalContext as i}from"./modal-context";import{StyledModalBody as m}from"./modal.styles";import n from"../utils/clsx";import{jsx as s}from"react/jsx-runtime";const d="nextui-modal-body",e=({className:o,children:r,autoMargin:e,...l})=>{const{autoMargin:u,noPadding:c}=t(i),g=a((()=>void 0!==u?u:e),[e,u]);return s(m,{className:n(d,{[`${d}-auto-margin`]:g,[`${d}-no-padding`]:c},o),autoMargin:g,noPadding:c,...l,children:r})};e.toString=()=>".nextui-modal-body";const l=o.memo(e);export default r(l,{className:"",autoMargin:!0});
